info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Erie and Crawford Counties through 800 PM EDT... At 714 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles northwest of Northwest Harborcreek to Cambridge Springs to near Pymatuning Central. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Erie, Meadville, Corry, Titusville, North East, Union City, Cambridge Springs, Waterford, Wattsburg, Adamsville, Canadohta Lake, Riceville, Northwest Harborcreek, Lincolnville, Guys Mills, Atlantic, Pymatuning Central, Harborcreek, Lawrence Park and Wesleyville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
